channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Redundant bus stop, 4th January
item.description:
No buses stop here - confusing particularly for new students every year

item.title: Several deep potholes along Barrow Wake Lane from field named "Cuckoo Pen" through to Birdlip Radio Station., 4th January
item.description:
All of these potholes are in the carriageway and are all in previously repaired road. Some are 10-20cm deep.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Underpass flooded since 22nd December, 4th January
item.description:
Barrow Wake Lane, Shab Hill, Birdlip has been flooded for 2 weeks. Highways maintenance vehicles have attended twice, but just put up 'Flood' signs. A long-term fix is required please as this road floods frequently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet
